Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2013 01:48AM JenMarie22781 wrote: About a month ago I found a lump in my right armpit and thought it was from shaving and ignored it. I went Thursday for a routine gyn appt and she seemed quite worried about the lump. It's firm, fixed and close to the surface. She said I have an enlarged lymph node and she wants me to see a surgeon. My appt is 3/12 and Im a mess. My mom was diagnosed with breast cancer about 3 yrs ago and that scares me even more. I have 3 daughters and husband but I don't want to worry them so here I am venting. I cant help but think the worst. Thanks for listening.
Posts.Title: Stressed CRGirl CRGirl

Posts.Content: Feb 24, 2013 04:29PM JenMarie22781 wrote: Thanks you so much for your for your response and such kind words! I agree and I will try harder to be open with him regarding this. I just feel like I've been worried enough for the both of us. Patience is not one of my stronger traits :) Thanks
